alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 1:41PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Diego County through 230 PM PST... At 141 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mira Mesa, or near Del Mar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carlsbad, El Cajon, Encinitas, La Mesa, Poway, Ramona, Coronado, Del Mar, Mission Valley, Hillcrest, Linda Vista, North Park, Midway District Including Lindbergh Field, Tierrasanta, University City, Downtown San Diego, La Jolla, Mission Beach, Point Loma and Escondido. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
